thread.title: Euro zone to pay 5.7 billion euro loan tranche to Greece later in March - Reuters

title: Euro zone to pay 5.7 billion euro loan tranche to Greece later in March - Reuters
text: March 12, 2018 / 5:12 PM / Updated 5 hours ago Euro zone to pay 5.7 billion euro loan tranche to Greece later in March Reuters Staff 1 Min Read BRUSSELS (Reuters) - The euro zone bailout fund will pay out the next, 5.7 billion euro loan tranche to Greece in the second half of March after national approval procedures are completed, the chairman of euro zone finance ministers Mario Centeno said on Monday. Euro coins are seen in front of a displayed Greece flag in this picture illustration, June 29, 2015. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/File Photo Reporting By Jan Strupczewski
